mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_access_log ( provider, address, uri, biz_id, serial_no, call_status, title, req_data, res_data, exception, date_created, last_modified, disabled, deleted, remark ) VALUES ( #{provider}, #{address}, #{uri}, #{bizId}, #{serialNo}, #{callStatus}, #{title}, #{reqData}, #{resData}, #{exception}, now(), now(), 0, 0, #{remark} );
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_access_log SET call_status=#{callStatus},last_modified=now(),res_data=#{resData},exception=#{exception} WHERE provider=#{provider} and biz_id=#{bizId} and serial_no=#{serialNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_access_log where id=#{id} limit 1;
